00015 typedef struct pouch_pkt {
00016     /*
00017        Holds data to be sent to
00018        or received from a CouchDB
00019        server
00020      */
00021     char *data;
00022     char *offset;
00023     size_t size;
00024 } pouch_pkt;
00025 
00026 typedef struct pouch_request {
00027     /*
00028        A structure to be used
00029        to send a request to 
00030        a CouchDB server and 
00031        save the response, as
00032        well as any error codes.
00033      */
00034     struct curl_slist *headers; // Custom headers for uploading
00035     char *method;               // HTTP method
00036     char *url;                  // Destination (e.g., "http://127.0.0.1:5984/test");
00037     char *usrpwd;               // Holds a user:password authentication string
00038     CURLcode curlcode;  // CURL request status holder
00039     long httpresponse;  // holds the http response of a request
00040     pouch_pkt req;              // holds data to be sent
00041     pouch_pkt resp;             // holds response
00042     // int error;               // holds an error code
00043 } pouch_request;
